<small>Hebrew form: [[H4566]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַעֲבַד‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 60, 3) b</sup>)] **noun [masculine]** ==work== (Biblical Hebrew [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַעְבָּד‎</span>] [[Job.34.25|Job 34:25]] <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>ib.</sup></lookup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> of magic ***works***); — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַעֲבָדוֺ֫הִי‎</span> [[Dan.4.34|Dan 4:34]] (suffix of God).
